name: Plant Defender
description:
Overview

The plant kingdom has been at peace for years; their society flourishing. One day it all changed. The insect empire had been watching in distant jealousy as their neighbors grew fat and lazy and when they took their first shot, no one was ready for it

Gameplay

For Now, explore the various ways and options of making the perfect soldier!

Goal

Take control of a plant soldier, genetically modified to your specifications and fight back against the invading insects in whatever way you can find success.
